description:
Law is at the whim of Doflamingo and Trebol, while Luffy still has to deal with Bellamy, who fights to keep his honor even after being released by Doflamingo! Meanwhile, Gladius is about to detonate the ground around Cavendish and Bartolomeo!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der Stolz eines Mannes – Bellamys finaler Angriff!
La fierté d`un homme. La dernière charge de Bellamy !
La scelta di Bellamy - L`ultima sfida!
Otoko no Iji: Bellamy Saigo no Totsugeki!
The Man`s Pride! Bellamy`s Last Charge!
¡El orgullo de un hombre! ¡El último ataque de Bellamy!
男の意地 ベラミー最期の突撃!
